name: Node Connector
description:
This is a fun little project I came up with when I was bored in school so I decided to make it in Unity. If you have any feedback for this please tell me in the comments I'd love to hear what you think!

Doesn't support saving yet!

-------------------------------------------------------

Left click drag (on a node) - Moves the node

Right click (on a node) - Removes the node

Spawn button - Creates new node

Reset button - Resets the whole simulation

+ and - buttons - Zoom in and out
